title: Woman holding a banner
description: Phototgraphers' description: photos and video of Jan 29-Feb 11, 2011, Protests (downtown) & celebration in Maadi. Text in image: لواء شرطة بالداخلية اسمه/عبده محمد الدمرداش يمارس البلطجة عليه و اشتكيته عند النائب العام و حبسنى أنا و أولادى و حرقونى بالنار و خطف ابنى طالب عمره 14 سنة لا لمبارك. Translation of Text in image: A major-general in the Interior police called Abdo Mohamed el Demerdash bullied me and i reported him to attorney general, he locked my children and i up, set fire to me, and kidnapped my 14 year old son, NO TO MUBARAK.
name: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Police brutality; Protest movements; Revolutions
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
